sentences.sContent: The scheme cost a lot more than we had originally envisaged.
sentences.sCn: 该计划的花费大大超出了我们最初所预想的数额。

sentences.sContent: ...The deepest divide is in the way spouses envisage their lifestyle in their later years...
...This is why we can now envisage a different approach-and get better results...

remMethod.val: en ＋ vis(看) ＋ age(表行为) → 想象

trans.tranOther: to think that something is likely to happen in the future
